title: Updated: Civilized Cycles Vespa-Modeled eBike has self-leveling suspension, carries passenger
content:
Editor’s Note: We have updated the article to include Civilized Cycles explanation of the self-leveling suspension technology. Civilized Cycles have released an eBike modeled on the Vespa moped, complete with a 750W mid-drive motor, self-leveling suspension and space for a passenger! The Model 1 gets expanding panniers for up to four fully laden shopping bags […]

The post Updated: Civilized Cycles Vespa-Modeled eBike has self-leveling suspension, carries passenger appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
